pages.title: Green Anaconda
pages.text: The green anaconda ($(o)Eunectes murinus$()), also known as the giant anaconda, common anaconda, common water boa or sucuri, is a boa species found in South America.$(br2)It is the heaviest and one of the longest known extant snake species.$(br2)Like all boas, it is a non-venomous constrictor.

pages.title: Green Anaconda
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Randomly active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:beef$(br2)Number of Offspring: 2$(br2)Growth time: 7 Days
